uniform mat4 mg_ModelView, mg_Projection; attribute vec2 mg_TexCoord0, mg_TexCoord1; attribute vec3 mg_Vertex; varying vec2 mg_UV0, mg_UV1; void main() { gl_Position = mg_Projection * mg_ModelView * vec4(mg_Vertex, 1); mg_UV0 = mg_TexCoord0; mg_UV1 = mg_TexCoord1; }

precision mediump float; uniform mat4 mg_TextureMatrix; uniform sampler2D mg_Texture0, mg_Texture1; uniform vec4 mg_Color; uniform float mg_Texture0_Weight, mg_Texture1_Weight, mg_Color_Weight; uniform vec4 mg_Texture0_Modulate, mg_Texture1_Modulate; varying vec2 mg_UV0, mg_UV1; vec2 transform_uv(vec2 uv) { vec4 v = vec4(uv, 0, 1); v = mg_TextureMatrix * v; return v.xy; } void main() { vec4 col = vec4(0, 0, 0, 0); if(mg_Texture0_Weight > 0.05) { col += mg_Texture0_Modulate * texture2D(mg_Texture0, transform_uv(mg_UV0)) * mg_Texture0_Weight; } if(mg_Texture1_Weight > 0.05) { col += mg_Texture1_Modulate * texture2D(mg_Texture1, transform_uv(mg_UV1)) * mg_Texture1_Weight; } if(mg_Color_Weight > 0.05) { col += mg_Color * mg_Color_Weight; } gl_FragColor = col; }
